text: Christian Wiyghan Tumi (15 October 1930 – 2 April 2021) was a Cameroonian Cardinal Priest and the Archbishop Emeritus of Douala in the Catholic Church.http://212.77.1.245/news_services/bulletin/news/24671.php?index=24671⟨=en#RINUNCIA%20E%20SUCCESSIONE%20DELL’ARCIVESCOVO%20DI%20DOUALA%20(CAMERUN) Tumi is known as Santi Martiri dell'Uganda a Poggio Ameno. He was made cardinal on 28 June 1988 by Pope John Paul II, Cardinal Tumi was named the Archbishop of Douala on 31 August 1991. Tumi died on 2 April 2021, aged 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cameroonian Roman Catholic priests Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:People from Douala
title: Christian Tumi
